Package Entities

Class ShowTime

java.lang.Object
Entities.ShowTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShowTime extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a movie showtime. A showtime is shown at one cinema.

      public DayType checkDayType()

    • bookSeat

      public boolean bookSeat(String seatNum)
      Update/Book a seat for a movie showtime.
      Parameters:
      seatNum - Seat number to book (E.g., A3).
      Returns:
      Return result of update of seat (i.e., True of seat is vacant and successfully booked).
